title: Deadly Twist
description: In this Dateline classic, California mother, Rachel Winkler, is found dead in her home. Her husband tells law enforcement he killed her in self-defense, but they soon find something from his past that changes everything. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 20, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
